Package Engine.Entities.Projectiles

Class CircleProjectile

java.lang.Object
Engine.Entities.Entity
Engine.Entities.Projectile
Engine.Entities.Projectiles.CircleProjectile
public class CircleProjectile extends Projectile
Represents a circle projectile in the game. Extends the Projectile class.
Author:
joey
